com.conversantmedia.mapreduce.io

Class CompositeSortKeySerialization<G extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<G>,S extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • com.conversantmedia.mapreduce.io.CompositeSortKeySerialization<G,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    G - Grouping/Partitioning key type
    S - Sorting key type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.io.serializer.Serialization<CompositeSortKey<G,S>>

    public class CompositeSortKeySerialization<G extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<G>,S extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<S>>
extends org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.serializer.Serialization<CompositeSortKey<G,S>>
    Encapsulates the serialization functionality for a job using the CompositeSortKey key.
